mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_NO, A.PRODUCT_NO, A.TRIP_NAME, A.TRIP_CONTENTS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY U.USER_NO DESC) AS RN, U.USER_NO, H.PRODUCT_NO, P.TRIP_NAME, P.TRIP_CONTENTS FROM USER_T U INNER JOIN HEART_T H ON U.USER_NO = H.USER_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT_T P ON H.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
